about_the_game: Grove is a cozy tower defense game where you nurture a small forest under siege by lumberjacks. Plant and upgrade trees with unique abilities to protect your grove. Customize and decorate your forest to enhance its calming atmosphere, while rhythmic music and sound effects help you unwind. Designed for relaxation, the game minimizes blue light to promote better sleep, offering a soothing escape as you build a natural haven from a single tree.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2011 or newer) or Apple M1 (via Rosetta)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible audio output
  • Additional Notes: Game runs on both Intel and Apple Silicon via Rosetta
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5 (2013 or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro, AMD Radeon, or Apple M1 integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible audio output
  • Additional Notes: Native support for Apple Silicon is recommended for optimal performance

short_description: Nurture a small forest under siege by lumberjacks in this cozy tower defense game. Plant and upgrade trees with unique abilities to protect your grove, customize and decorate your forest, and unwind with the soothing escape of building a natural haven from a single sapling.
